channel.title: "Custom" Project
channel.description: Looking for a side project where maybe a few of us could get together and just create a custom server. I am not talking about releasing a server for the public but just setting up a environment where we can throw around different ideas. The whole point of the project would to be to create something new and unique. Feel free to leave your comments/concerns.

item.title: "Custom" Project
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Project has been started.

/lock.

item.title: "Custom" Project
item.dc:creator: @Patrickk Patrickk
item.description:
@Patrickk wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:12, topic:403377”][quote author=Pompano21 link=topic=500437.msg3662449#msg3662449 date=1310423402]

This is something were working on my server - Kind of creative I think? (Note: I don’t care if people hate on it.)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iVvyXWVQ-cI

Most the info is in the Description. I didn’t list everything.
& I know its not hard to do, so you don’t have to state that either. (Adding new items wise)

Did you really just post a video based on XML edits?
[/quote]U jelly?

Your obviously gay. Stop saying “Jelly”, it is fucking gay.

usojelly

[/quote]

That would be jam mate

item.title: "Custom" Project
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Sprites are a pain in the ass when the item is wearable
I guess you can blame the lack of sprite development on the sprite editor. Only a few people know what the hell they are doing when it comes to graphic work.

@Dan, nice feedback.

If anyone is down for a custom project let me know here or via message.

Read full topic

item.title: "Custom" Project
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:4, topic:403377”]@Dan,

Meh, anyone in the project has the ability to “steal/leak”. That is why the project will be open source or private with a selected few. The environment I am talking about setting up is a play ground for innovation. If you think someone is to steal your production then you obviously still thinking inside the box.[/quote]
You’re an idiot.

Read full topic

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:4, topic:403377”]@Dan,

Meh, anyone in the project has the ability to “steal/leak”. That is why the project will be open source or private with a selected few. The environment I am talking about setting up is a play ground for innovation. If you think someone is to steal your production then you obviously still thinking inside the box.

@Keith

Creating new items is fun when you create the sprites for them.[/quote]

I should try and make new sprites actually. (For the Armour)

item.title: "Custom" Project
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Looking for a side project where maybe a few of you guys could get together and just create a custom server. I am not talking about releasing a server for the public but just setting up a environment where you guys can throw around different ideas. The whole point of the project would be for you guys do all the work and I take credit for it and to create something new and unique. Feel free to leave your comments/concerns.

Better
